title: Was Attahiyat a conversation between Allah and the Prophet ‎ﷺ? assim al hakeem JAL
transcript: Finally, Chaudhry says, was At-Tahiyyat a conversation between Allah and Prophet Muhammad alayhis salatu wassalam on the miraculous night journey? What should be our intention? Is it like saying salam directly to Prophet Muhammad alayhis salatu wassalam and righteous slaves of Allah? There is no hadith, neither weak nor fabricated, there is no hadith at all stating that At-Tahiyyat was a conversation between Allah and Prophet Muhammad alayhis salatu wassalam on the miraculous night journey when the Prophet alayhis salatu wassalam was admitted and he said, At-Tahiyyat wassalam wassalam wassalam wassalam wassalam wassalam wassalam wassalam wassalam wassalam wassalam wassalam
